price: 44. En jullie zullen je herinneren wat ik jullie zeg, En ik laat mijn zaak aan Allah over. Waarlijk, Allah is de Alziende over (Zijn) dienaren.”
arabic: فَسَتَذۡكُرُونَ مَآ أَقُولُ لَكُمۡۚ وَأُفَوِّضُ أَمۡرِيٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بَصِيرُۢ بِٱلۡعِبَادِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: fasatadhkurūna mā aqūlu lakum wa-ufawwiḍu amrī ilā al-lahi inna al-laha baṣīrun bil-ʿibādi
